description: The Mwamweni Mart initiative in Mombasa, Kenya, focuses on empowering the local community by repurposing coconut waste into beautiful handmade mats. The project not only creates jobs but also promotes environmental sustainability by utilizing materials that would otherwise be discarded. The initiative operates on a community-based model, relying on word-of-mouth marketing and local demand, while aiming to expand its reach and formalize its operations for greater impact.
name: Mwamweni Mart
